name: Becca's Bunch
overview: Meet Becca, Russell, Sylvia and Pedro - together they are Becca's Bunch! With unique ideas, heart and positive thinking, the gang always manage to overcome any challenge they encounter in Wagtail Woods.

episodes.name: Fogtail Woods
episodes.overview: When a thick fog descends on Wagtail Woods, Becca's Bunch find a unique way to light the airport landing strip so Mums can make a safe landing.

episodes.name: Happy Pinecone Day
episodes.overview: Becca's Bunch are trying to photograph the mysterious Pinecone Bunny, but when he is accidentally injured, plans change, and suddenly they have to save Pinecone Day for everyone.

episodes.name: Stick With Me
episodes.overview: Becca and Beatrice accidentally get their wing and paws stuck together, so Beatrice has no option but to join the Bunch on an adventure up Pointy Peak to find a special flower that will set them free.

episodes.name: Beddy, Set, Go
episodes.overview: Pedro decides to have a nap, rather than race Casper and Jasper, so Becca turns Pedro's bed into a go-cart, because they couldn't be a winning team without him.

episodes.name: Mayor For A Day
episodes.overview: When Becca volunteers to be Mayor for the Day, she answers everyone's requests with a "yes", creating havoc in Wagtail Woods, before she finally learns the value of saying "no".

episodes.name: Rockin' The Wood
episodes.overview: Woodrock is the biggest concert of the year at Wagtail Woods. When the opening act drops out, Becca's Bunch offer to play, but they have no lead singer - until they discover Pedro's inner rockstar.

episodes.name: Mail Mayhem
episodes.overview: Sylvia accidentally knocks a letter out of MJ's delivery bag, so Becca and the Bunch decide to do a good turn and deliver the letter themselves. But first they have to catch it!

episodes.name: Party Party
episodes.overview: Becca wants to help out at two parties but she can't be in two places at once! What will she do? Easy. Why she just brings the two parties together!

episodes.name: Tree Talk
episodes.overview: When a mysterious noise alerts the Bunch the biggest and oldest tree in Wagtail Woods is at risk of drying up and falling over, Becca and the Bunch decide to unite their fellow Wagtailers and save Big Wood.

episodes.name: Junior Lifeguard
episodes.overview: It's Junior Lifeguard Day, and though the Hare brothers want to be the very first to earn their Lifeguard Certificates, Becca and the Bunch follow Steven De Gannet's training to keep the beach, and Casper and Jasper, safe.

episodes.name: Tent Trouble
episodes.overview: Becca, the Bunch and Pops are off on a Wagtail Ranger camping trip to the top of Pointy Peak. But when they forget to bring a tent, they have to use their creativity to solve the problem.

episodes.name: Acorn King
episodes.overview: When the Bunch find an old map, they try to track down the secret cave of the Acorn King. With Casper and Jasper on their heels the Bunch must overcome all the obstacles on the hunt to discover the Acorn King's lost treasure.

episodes.name: Woodness Book Of Wagtail Records
episodes.overview: Becca's Bunch and the Hare brothers race each other to break the Woodness Book of Wagtail Records for the biggest sand sculpture ever built. When Casper and Jasper lose the challenge, Becca decides to include everyone.

episodes.name: Wagtastic Four
episodes.overview: Pops inspires Becca and the Bunch to play at being superheroes, so they create their own Super Bunch. But when Barry, Beatrice and the Hares get stuck in a tree, the Bunch have to find the hero inside for real.

episodes.name: Rock-a-Bye Bunnies
episodes.overview: When Lola's bunnies stay over at the Bird House, Becca offers to put them all to bed. However, the Bunch find getting seven bunnies AND Benny and Shelley to sleep is a nightmare.

episodes.name: Wow Me Wagtail
episodes.overview: Becca plans to wow the talent show judges with a spectacular ballet troupe, including the Bunch, the Bunnies, and Ringo, but she soon realises Ringo needs to dance to his own tune.

episodes.name: Wishing Stone
episodes.overview: Becca leads the Bunch on a quest to find the legendary Wishing Stone, so Pedro can fulfil his ultimate wish - to be brave.

episodes.name: Cute Lil' Bug
episodes.overview: Becca wants a pet, and volunteers to mind Ringo's bug, Sue. However, looking after Sue proves to be a challenge when she changes in ways none of The Bunch expected.

episodes.name: Eye Of The Beholder
episodes.overview: When Mayor Ladymaus asks Wagtailers to make artwork to celebrate how much they love Wagtail Woods, Becca worries her picture is too small, not knowing she has created a tiny masterpiece.

episodes.name: Benny & Shelly's Big Day Out
episodes.overview: Moms and Pops promise the Bunch a treat for picking Benny and Shelly up from a playdate, but Becca's Bunch lose track of the twins on the way home.

episodes.name: Happy Pal 'N' Times
episodes.overview: When the Bunch discover Ringo plans to spend Pal 'n' Times day by himself because Sue is away, they set about finding him the perfect companion. But Becca realises only Sue will do, and with Mom's help, brings Sue home.

episodes.name: Legendary Gill
episodes.overview: Becca remembers the Bunch's unbelievable adventure when they set out to prove that Legendary Gill, the giant fish in Wagtail Lake, is real.

episodes.name: Their Song
episodes.overview: John Wolfenstein and Mr Nugget have an on-air argument and go AWOL. Becca's Bunch fill in as temporary DJs, and realise that they need to reunite the old friends and get them back on the air.

episodes.name: Robobuck
episodes.overview: Buck is going on vacation and leaves a robot to take care of his chores. But when it's commandeered by Beatrice, it's up to Becca's Bunch to get Robobuck back under control.

episodes.name: Helper Badge
episodes.overview: Becca's Bunch are disheartened when they fail to earn their Happy Helper Day badges - until they find Gill. But there's a problem, Gill is the biggest fish in Wagtail and the Bunch are very small in comparison.

episodes.name: Mum's Day
episodes.overview: Becca believes bigger is better when it comes to giving a Mums' Day present. But she soon learns that it truly is the thought that counts.

episodes.name: Take a Kid to Work Day
